name: Substeps IntelliJ Plugin
description: A plugin to help write and execute Substep features and compose substeps Inspired heavily by the IntelliJ Junit plugin much of the code here is based on that and adapted for Substeps.
notes: Upgrade to use latest version of Substeps (1.1.1) moving all config to typesafe config. See https://github.com/Substeps/substeps-framework/blob/master/1.1.0_upgrade.md for more details.
